string.u: Where can I find the reading code? Click here

resources.string: We are a contact you can trust. We are at your side in all situations and are always available for you.

We want to digitize every manual reading in Germany! And thus make reading as easy and convenient as possible for everyone involved. Especially in times of digitization and the permanent lack of time, it is essential that we simplify things in this industry as well.
The digital meter reading input, which you can easily record yourself with messtex, saves you a lot of time. The advantages are clear
By reading with the Messtex app, you no longer have to waste vacation days on manual readings by service technicians
Waiting for the service technicians becomes unnecessary
Entering your home by foreign service technicians who have a lot of contact with other people and households becomes unnecessary - especially in these times in which we live with COVID-19
We protect our environment together, because the many trips for first and second appointments, sometimes even third appointments become obsolete
We save a lot of mail traffic and paper if you choose our digital reminder service for meter reading

With the help of our partners, we have developed a unique system with which you can easily, time- and cost-efficiently perform your own meter reading. In designing our app, we placed great emphasis on making it easy and intuitive to use, so that truly everyone can benefit from our renewal
We are a contact you can trust. We are at your side in all situations and are always available for you.
What makes us the best choice?

At Messtex, we have made it our mission to modernize the meter reading sector and to reform the market together with our partners and customers. The 21st century has already brought us many things: digitization is continuously overhauling and improving existing legacy systems and giving them a new lease of life. We are getting on this bandwagon of innovation and making the vision of revolutionizing the meter reading sector! To do this, we have set ourselves strict principles by which we live and act every day:
By digitizing the process of recording heating and water costs, we are making a valuable contribution to the environment. In this way, we reduce our ecological footprint and take responsibility.
Innovation means progress. We want to shape this progress so that everyone can follow it from home.

We would like to make the recording of heating and water costs as simple and convenient as possible for you. With no waiting for the service technician, no formal clean-up, and no invasion of your privacy.
Please enter the five digit code from the reading certificate.
In order to assign your details correctly, we need your contact details:
Please send me the overview as an email copy
Record your meter readings. Easy, quick and without an appointment.
kilograms of CO₂ we have already saved together!
Here you will find useful tips for your everyday life.
Now enter the meter reading of your meter manually without any decimal places:
We want to digitize every manual reading in Germany!
Submit your data conveniently via the app
Together we protect our environment and take responsibility.
Enter the readings of your water and heating meters conveniently online.
Measure your meter reading from the comfort of your own home, without waiting, without formal clean-ups and without intruding into your privacy.
You have 3 counters to be read from. Please send us the following three meter readings:
